Roasted Salmon

Ingredients:

  • 4 salmon fillets (skin-on or skinless, about 6 oz. each)
  • Salt and pepper
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice
  • 1 teaspoon honey
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon chopped fresh dill (optional)

Procedure:

  1. Preheat the oven to 400째F (200째C).
  2. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
  3. Season the salmon fillets generously with salt and pepper on both sides.
  4. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, honey, minced garlic, and chopped dill (if using).
  5. Brush the honey-garlic mixture all over the salmon fillets.
  6. Place the salmon fillets on the prepared baking sheet, skin-side down if using skin-on fillets.
  7. Roast the salmon in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the internal temperature of the thickest part of the salmon reaches 145째F (63째C).
  8. Remove the salmon from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
  9. Serve Hot and enjoy!
